TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed UIViewAnimationCurve extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration of animation curve styles.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationCurve EaseIn = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Causes the animation to begin slowly and speed up as it progresses.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationCurve EaseInOut = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The animatione begins and ends slowly. This is the default for most animations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationCurve EaseOut = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Causes the animation to begin quickly and slow down as it progresses.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MonoTouch.UIKit.UIViewAnimationCurve Linear = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Causes the animation to proceed evenly.
